author: max
name: NoSpoiler
install_msg:
Thanks for installing.
This cog relies on red's autoimmune, to ignore role(s) or user(s) use `[p]autoimmune` from red. You are not immune from any spoiler filter without setting up autoimmune.
<https://cogs.maxapp.tv/> for documentation.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: Prevent spoilers in the server by deleting messages with spoiler tags or attachments.
short: Prevent spoilers in the server by deleting messages with spoiler tags or attachments.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
